title: Porosity and fluid pathway development during cadmium sequestration by calcium carbonate replacement

Cadmium contamination of ground water and soil has drastically increased in some areas through the last decades and remediation strategies are currently being investigated. The coupled dissolution-precipitation of calcium carbonate...
